snippet.title: RetroDoge Dev Update - June 2022
snippet.description:
RetroDoge Monthly Dev Update - June
New Level - Pirates
- Built in the new tileset
- Animated sprites: Water & Pirate flag
- Setup testing level
- Created multi directional shooting cannons;
- Exploding TNT barrel; explodes on two hits & does damage to surrounding characters

Added to Lava Castle Theme 
- Controllable rising lava mechanic w/ vertical level 
- Increased the lava demo level play size 
- Created working parallax effect for background 
- Hidden spikes mechanic added 
- Button + door opening  

Interface (GUI)
- Avatar 
- Lives/heart icons 
- Fully working health bar 
- Collected coins score visual

Collecting Coins
- Implement coin artwork
- Save collected coins
- Reset collection coins on game over
- Level completed visuals

Game Build
- Edited & imported new character sprites
- Animations: Idle, Running, Jumping, Double Jump, Falling, Lightsaber
- Idle animation: Randomly smirk or wink when in idle state

Mechanics
- Swinging pendulums
- Bouncing pads
- Falling blocks
